author: darksilence

review: The chromecast is the best value!The amount of things I can do on this little dongle is amazing!I love casting my phone, computer, Hulu, Netflix, and Plex to my TV. Why spend hundreds more on a smart TV when this makes your dumb TV more intelligent than ever.When my wife goes to the neighbor's house to watch True Blood, all she has to do is take this little dongle, plug it into their TV and the rest is done from her phone! It is very quick and easy to take the shows and movies you love to any screen.The biggest downside to the chromecast is no option for a password. My wife and I went to a resort and took this along so we didn't have to pay extra to watch movies in our hotel room. Everyone there at the resort were inadvertently casting their youtube videos to our chromecast. It got very annoying and it wasn't worth it until all the little kids went to bed.
